016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.providers;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationFeature;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
022import jakarta.inject.Inject;
023import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
024import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
025import jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
027import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap;
028import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
030
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.io.OutputStream;
033import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
034import java.lang.reflect.Type;
035
036@Singleton
037@Provider
038@Produces(MediaType.WILDCARD)
039public class JsonNodeMessageBodyWriter
040        implements MessageBodyWriter<JsonNode> {
041    private ObjectMapper objectMapper;
042
043    @Inject
044    public JsonNodeMessageBodyWriter() {
045        objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
046        objectMapper.configure(JsonGenerator.Feature.AUTO_CLOSE_TARGET, false);
047        objectMapper.configure(DeserializationFeature.FAIL_ON_UNKNOWN_PROPERTIES, false);
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public boolean isWriteable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
052        boolean result = JsonNode.class.isAssignableFrom(type) && (mediaType.isWildcardType() || mediaType.getSubtype().endsWith("json"));
053        return result;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public void writeTo(JsonNode jsonObject, Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations,
058                        MediaType mediaType, MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders,
059                        OutputStream entityStream) throws IOException, WebApplicationException {
060        objectMapper.writeValue(entityStream, jsonObject);
061    }
062}
